item.title: Search for suspects in shooting that left 4 dead, 12 wounded in Mississippi
item.description: Officials in Leland, Mississippi, are calling on the public's help after four people were killed and 12 others wounded in a mass shooting.

item.title: WATCH: Jared Kushner, Ivanka Trump speak in Israel after ceasefire announcement
item.description: Jared Kushner and Ivanka Trump addressed a crowd gathered in Tel Aviv following the announcement of the ceasefire agreement in Gaza.

item.description: A woman in rural West Texas says she was caught by surprise when she spotted a car-sized piece of scientific equipment that was adorned with NASA stic...

item.title: Oscar-winning actress Diane Keaton dies at 79
item.description: Diane Keaton, the Oscar-winning actress known for her performances in "Annie Hall" and "The Godfather," has died at the age of 79.

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Coding errors blamed for some CDC layoffs, official says
item.description: The Trump Administration's federal layoffs have affected at least nine crucial CDC departments, sources told ABC News.
